L.QUANTITY > 0 THEN L.QUANTITY ELSE (SELECT SUM(IOQ.QUANTITY) FROM INV_ONHAND_QUANTITY IOQ WHERE IOQ.ORGANIZATION_ID = L.DEFAULT_INV_ORG_ID AND IOQ.ITEM_ID = L.ITEM_ID) END) END END SHIPMENT_QTY, CASE L.ITEM_TYPE WHEN 'VN' THEN NULL WHEN 'VY' THEN NULL ELSE L.QUANTITY - NVL((CASE L.LINE_ID WHEN (SELECT DISTINCT D.ORDER_LINE_ID FROM DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LINE D WHERE D.ORDER_LINE_ID = L.LINE_ID) THEN (SELECT SUM(dodl.outstanding_qty) FROM dm_order_delivery dod, dm_order_delivery_line dodl WHERE dod.delivery_id = dodl.delivery_id AND dod.delivery_status IN ('SHIPP', 'PCKUP') AND dodl.order_line_id = l.line_id) ELSE CASE L.ITEM_TYPE WHEN 'VN' THEN NULL WHEN 'VY' THEN NULL ELSE (CASE WHEN (SELECT SUM(IOQ.QUANTITY) FROM INV_ONHAND_QUANTITY IOQ WHERE IOQ.ORGANIZATION_ID = L.DEFAULT_INV_ORG_ID AND IOQ.ITEM_ID = L.ITEM_ID) - L.QUANTITY > 0 THEN L.QUANTITY ELSE (SELECT SUM(IOQ.QUANTITY) FROM INV_ONHAND_QUANTITY IOQ WHERE IOQ.ORGANIZATION_ID = L.DEFAULT_INV_ORG_ID AND IOQ.ITEM_ID = L.ITEM_ID) END) END END), 0) END NOT_SHIPPED_QTY FROM INV_ITEM_B B, INV_ITEM_TL I, OM_SALES_LINE L WHERE L.ITEM_ID = I.ITEM_ID AND L.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID AND I.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} AND L.HEADER_ID = (SELECT O.HEADER_ID FROM OM_SALES_ORDER O WHERE O.ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

#{deliveryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT ceil(rownum/15) page, A.* FROM (SELECT DL.LINE_ID, (SELECT IIB.ITEM_NUMBER FROM INV_ITEM_B IIB WHERE IIB.ITEM_ID = DL.PACKAGE_ITEM_ID) PACKAGE_CODE, B.ITEM_NUMBER PRODUCT_CODE, TL.ITEM_NAME DESCTIPTION, L.QUANTITY QTY, DT.LOT_NUMBER, DT.EXPIRY_DATE, CASE WHEN dt.lot_number IS NOT NULL THEN nvl(nvl(dt.outstanding_qty, 0) - nvl(dt.return_qty, 0), 0) ELSE dl.outstanding_qty END shipment_qty, L.QUANTITY - (SELECT SUM(DOL.OUTSTANDING_QTY) FROM DM_ORDER_DELIVERY DO, DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LINE DOL WHERE DO.DELIVERY_ID = DOL.DELIVERY_ID AND DO.DELIVERY_STATUS IN ('SHIPP', 'PCKUP') AND DOL.ORDER_LINE_ID = L.LINE_ID) NOT_SHIPPED_QTY FROM INV_ITEM_B B, INV_ITEM_TL TL, OM_SALES_LINE L, (SELECT T.DELIVERY_LINE_ID, T.LOT_NUMBER, T.OUTSTANDING_QTY, T.RETURN_QTY, TO_CHAR(I.EXPIRY_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') EXPIRY_DATE FROM DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOT T, INV_LOT I, DM_ORDER_DELIVERY DOD, DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LINE DODL WHERE DODL.LINE_ID = T.DELIVERY_LINE_ID AND DOD.DELIVERY_ID = DODL.DELIVERY_ID AND DODL.INV_ORG_ID = I.ORGANIZATION_ID AND DODL.COUNT_ITEM_ID = I.ITEM_ID AND DOD.DELIVERY_STATUS IN ('SHIPP', 'PCKUP') AND T.LOT_NUMBER = I.LOT_NUMBER) DT, DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LINE DL WHERE DL.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID AND DL.ITEM_ID = TL.ITEM_ID AND DL.ORDER_LINE_ID = L.LINE_ID AND DL.LINE_ID = DT.DELIVERY_LINE_ID(+) AND TL.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} AND DL.DELIVERY_ID = #{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY DL.LINE_ID ASC) A WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LINE L WHERE L.LINE_ID = A.LINE_ID)

SELECT ceil(count(*)/15) pages FROM (SELECT DL.LINE_ID, (SELECT IIB.ITEM_NUMBER FROM INV_ITEM_B IIB WHERE IIB.ITEM_ID = DL.PACKAGE_ITEM_ID) PACKAGE_CODE, B.ITEM_NUMBER PRODUCT_CODE, TL.ITEM_NAME DESCTIPTION, L.QUANTITY QTY, DT.LOT_NUMBER, DT.EXPIRY_DATE, CASE WHEN dt.lot_number IS NOT NULL THEN nvl(nvl(dt.outstanding_qty, 0) - nvl(dt.return_qty, 0), 0) ELSE dl.outstanding_qty END shipment_qty, L.QUANTITY - (SELECT SUM(DOL.OUTSTANDING_QTY) FROM DM_ORDER_DELIVERY DO, DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LINE DOL WHERE DO.DELIVERY_ID = DOL.DELIVERY_ID AND DO.DELIVERY_STATUS IN ('SHIPP', 'PCKUP') AND DOL.ORDER_LINE_ID = L.LINE_ID) NOT_SHIPPED_QTY FROM INV_ITEM_B B, INV_ITEM_TL TL, OM_SALES_LINE L, (SELECT T.DELIVERY_LINE_ID, T.LOT_NUMBER, T.OUTSTANDING_QTY, T.RETURN_QTY, TO_CHAR(I.EXPIRY_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') EXPIRY_DATE FROM DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOT T, INV_LOT I, DM_ORDER_DELIVERY DOD, DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LINE DODL WHERE DODL.LINE_ID = T.DELIVERY_LINE_ID AND DOD.DELIVERY_ID = DODL.DELIVERY_ID AND DODL.INV_ORG_ID = I.ORGANIZATION_ID AND DODL.COUNT_ITEM_ID = I.ITEM_ID AND DOD.DELIVERY_STATUS IN ('SHIPP', 'PCKUP') AND T.LOT_NUMBER = I.LOT_NUMBER) DT, DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LINE DL WHERE DL.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID AND DL.ITEM_ID = TL.ITEM_ID AND DL.ORDER_LINE_ID = L.LINE_ID AND DL.LINE_ID = DT.DELIVERY_LINE_ID(+) AND TL.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} AND DL.DELIVERY_ID = #{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY DL.LINE_ID ASC) A WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LINE L WHERE L.LINE_ID = A.LINE_ID)
